cleanup_services.title: Basic Cleanup
cleanup_services.view_details: Includes cleansing, scrubbing, steaming, and pack
cleanup_services.description: Removes surface impurities and dead skin, giving your face a clean and fresh look.

cleanup_services.title: De-Tan Cleanup
cleanup_services.view_details: With de-tanning scrub and face pack
cleanup_services.description: Helps lighten sun tan and improves skin tone using fruit-based de-tanning products.

cleanup_services.title: Fruit Cleanup
cleanup_services.description: Gentle treatment suitable for sensitive skin, nourishes with natural fruit enzymes for a radiant finish.

cleanup_services.title: Herbal Cleanup
cleanup_services.view_details: Uses herbal products and steam therapy
cleanup_services.description: A soothing cleanup using herbal formulations that calm the skin and improve clarity.

cleanup_services.title: Anti-Pollution Cleanup
cleanup_services.description: Removes blackheads, pollutants, and toxins from the skin, leaving it fresh and detoxed.
